name: No No Square
description:
Made for AIE's Pre-Minor Game Jam.
Flee from the lava ghosts and escape the duck's nightmare! Collect keys to open doors and make your way to the end!

Credits:

  • Shakeel Khan - Producer, Designer, Audio
  • Hunter Mansanas - Producer, Post-Processing
  • Arieal Rushing - Artist Lead, Tech Artist
  • Melanie Templin - 3D Modeler, Animator
  • Finn Gray - Environment Artist
  • Sam Daman - AI Programmer
  • Jesse Simurdak - Player, UI, and Level Mechanic Programming
